text: aur jab tum apane haî€¼ja ke manaasik (karm) poore kar lo, to jis prakaar pahale apane poorvajon kee charcha karate rahe, usee prakaar balki usase bhee adhik allaah ka smaran[1] karo. unamen se kuchh aise hain, jo ye kahate hain ki he hamaare paalanahaar! (hamen jo dena hai,) sansaar hee mein de de. atah aise vyakti ke lie paralok mein koee bhaag nahin hai
